items.text: full outside off, drilled to long-off
items.shortText: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: comes down the wicket, Nurse fires it outside off, Tamim reaches it out and guides it to point
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length outside off, a bit of room and Tamim takes it from the keeper's gloves and dabs it towards third-man
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: full on the pads, Tamim tries to turn it around the corner but misses. Stifled appeal for lbw immediately turned down
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run
Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length on off, pushed to deep cover
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: length on middle, slow in pace, Tamim comes down and defends
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length, angled in and Tamim just helps it along past short fine-leg's right for another boundary
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: full on off, pushed to long-off
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: full on off, comes forward and defends
items.shortText: Chase to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: length on off, comes down the track and pushes it back to the bowler
items.shortText: Chase to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: short, pulled flat and hard but straight to the man at deep midwicket, who takes it, nearly over balances, but awareness of where the rope is helps him as he tosses it up and comes back to take it. Umpires consult the third umpire and the replays confirm that it was a clean catch
items.shortText: Chase to Soumya Sarkar, OUT

dismissal.text: Soumya Sarkar c Bravo b Chase 73 (116m 68b 9x4 1x6) SR: 107.35

items.preText:
Shakib comes in at 3

amzad: "there was a great opportunity for soumya for score a Ton, so far in this match he was excellent "
items.text: off the mark straightaway but a steer that is to third man's right. Sprinted out quickly and was alive to the possibility of a second
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.text: back of a length outside off, and he waits for it, cuts it again to square third man for another couple
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.text: leading edge just over the bowler. that drifted in and Shakib was too early in trying to work it around the corner, ends up ballooning, and very close to a leaping Nurse's fingers, but Shakib is safe
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: waits for it and steers it fine
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: good length on off, pushed to point
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: Shakib has asked for the tape that Nurse is wearing on his bowling finger to be taken off. the umpires agree and Nurse has to take it off
items.text: good length on off, pushed between point and cover
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.preText: H. Arif: "Soumya missed the TON, but would not like to see Tamim missing the opportunity. "
items.text: tried to throw the bowler off his line by moving around, but came back to his spot eventually. Full on the toes and clipped
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: lovely ball, flight dip and turn. Shakib went for the drive but the ball completely beat him, spinning past
items.shortText: Chase to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: another good length ball, pushed to point
items.shortText: Chase to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: darted this in a bit flatter and Shakib stays in his crease and punches into the offside
items.shortText: Chase to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: drifts on the pads and he flicks it away, but straight to short fine leg
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length on off, he gets behind it and taps it to mid-off
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off, dabbed to short fine leg where Cottrell makes a mess of a simple collection and allows the ball to slip through
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run
